name: recloseable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
A recloseable container can be closed again after it has been opened: The pack is 100% recyclable and recloseable for ease and convenience. The butter now comes in a re-closeable plastic container.
More examplesFewer examplesRecloseable fasteners provide another alternative.The number of new food products with a recloseable or resealable closure has risen over the last three years.The products come in a plastic bag with a recloseable zip. The bottles are lightweight, transparent, recloseable, and resealable.
